titleStmt.title: The two incomparable generalissimo's of the world, with their armies briefly described and embattailed, visibly and invisibly opposing each other.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Clad all in angry Armes of discontent,".
A duel between the Devil ("Generall of the Church Malignant") and Christ ("Generall of the Church Militant").
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
